A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Absolutely horrific. It's not a star wars movie except it has lightsabers and characters but in no way does it resemble the original trilogy. In fact\, the movie goes out of it's way to kick the teeth in of our beloved Luke Skywalker. I'm a die hard fan and I had such hope after the nearly perfect Rogue One\, but this movie.... this movie is worst than Episode I. Can't believe this has happened. Still angry.Absolutely horrific.
